product_name: FalconGuides Hiking Grand Staircase-Escalante and the Glen Canyon Region - 2nd Edition
long_description: Hiking Grand Staircase-Escalante and the Glen Canyon Region includes detailed maps, elevation tables and photographs to 59 of the best hiking adventures in Southern Utah.
